extension.name: Events Booking - Auto Event Data
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin set data (currently, only cancel before date) for events automatically when the event is saved so that you do not have to enter data for these fields manually.

field.name: exclude_category_ids
field.label: Exclude Categories
field.description: Select categories which you don't want to set data automatically

field.name: number_days_for_cancel_before_date
field.label: Number Days For Cancel Before Date
field.description: Cancel Before Date for events will be calculated base on event date minus for number of days entered into this parameter

field.name: only_set_if_empty
field.label: Only Set If Empty
field.description: If set to Yes, the plugin will only set cancel before date for the event if it was not set (empty) before
